page.title: 13Supernatural in S. Bradford.
page.content: {Bolling Hall,}now a museum has at least one call to fame.It is supposed to contain a{ghost room.}This is the bedroom in which the Earl of Newcastle slept after his victory at Adwalton Moor during the{Civil War}in 1643.The hall was his headquarters before his attack on Bradford.It is said that the Earl of Newcastle intended killing everyone in the town but during his sleep he was visited by a ghost who cried{'Pity poor Bradford;Pity poor {Bradford.'}Whatever happened that night the following day the town was plundered but only those who resisted were executed.Bradford was attacked on two occasions and remained a staunch friend of Parliament.
